newsitem.title: USA: Lotto World Inc seeks capital, cuts 12.
newsitem.headline: Lotto World Inc seeks capital, cuts 12.

text.p: Lotto World Inc said Friday that it is seeking additional capital to fund current and future operations and that it is negotiating capital investments with several firms.
The company also said that in an effort to conserve available capital, it was implementing the dismissal of 12 employees.

Lotto World is a publisher of lottery related magazines. It said Friday that it has signed an exclusive agreement with the Iowa Lottery to publish a new magazine, the Iowa Lottery Players Digest. The agreement, said the company follows similar ones in Georgia, Nebraska and Virginia in 1997.
